item.description: Our minister will be available to answer your questions about Buddhism in general and Nichiren Shu in particular.  We will introduce you to the basic service that can be adapted to practice in the home.  The foundation of our practice is to chant the title and sections of the Lotus Sutra, considered the foremost of the Buddha's teachings. Chanting is our form of meditation and is easier for many people to practice than sitting meditation.
item.how_to_find_us: The white house accross the intersection from the USM Law Bldg. (plenty of parking!)
